Author: lavendermyth
Text: From what I remember, weight gain on Abilify is more common on higher doses. Do you know what the goal dose is? Also, higher doses of AAPs are mostly used for psychotic symptoms, not depression, so it might not be an issue at all. Even so, weight gain isn't guaranteed and if there's also a chance it could help it might be worth taking that chance. And feeling better in general might also help you deal with eating more (I know for me being depressed doesn't make me want to stop restricting.)
